context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz could do is to
generation: seek assistance from charitable organizations or pharmaceutical assistance programs that help with the cost of prescription medications
seek help from charities, foundations, or non-profit organizations that specialize in assisting individuals who cannot afford necessary medications
look for patient assistance programs or non-profit organizations that aid in getting medications for those who can't afford them

look into financial aid programs, which are often provided by pharmaceutical companies, non-profit organizations, or government agencies to help individuals or families who can't afford the cost of their medications
approach a charity or organization that aids in funding expensive health treatments
seek financial assistance from family, friends, or from charitable organizations

attempt to negotiate with the pharmaceutical company or the pharmacy for a reduced price, apply for financial aid programs designed to help those who cannot afford their medication, or seek donations from family, friends, and community members
consider several options:
seek help from family, friends, or a community fundraising platform to raise the necessary funds for the medication
reach out to a health care organization or charity that might be able to provide financial assistance

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh could do is to
generation: call a taxi or an Uber to pick him up

call a taxi or a ride-share service such as Uber or Lyft
call a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hailing service to get him to the airport as quickly as possible while his car gets towed to a nearby mechanic
call for a taxi, Uber, or other ride service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber to quickly get him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber to take him to the airport
use his phone to call for a cab, an Uber or Lyft, or any other ride sharing service
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride-share service to take him to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. pay the missing money out of his own pocket
put his own money in the register to replace the missing amount

take money out of his own pocket and put it in the register to cover the loss
put in his own money to balance out the register

renew her gym membership on the spot or purchase a day pass so she can still workout during her lunch break

context_4.vignette: Mary is about to go to her final class of the day when she remebers that there is a homework assignment that is due. Mary's mom accidentally took her homework assignment out of her backpack when she was making room for her lunch. Now Mary has nothing to turn in for credit.
context_4.prompt: One thing that Mary could do is to
generation: contact her mom immediately and ask if she is able to drop off her homework at school
call or text her mom to bring the assignment to school, if it is possible
contact her mom and ask if she could bring the assignment to school
ask her teacher if she could turn in the assignment the next day, explaining the situation honestly
contact her mom and ask her to bring the homework to school before the class starts
quickly go home if it's nearby or call her mom to bring the assignment to school
explain the situation to her teacher and request for an extension or an opportunity to submit the assignment the next day
contact her teacher to explain the situation and ask for a brief extension to resubmit the homework
contact her teacher, explain the situation and ask if she could submit the assignment a little later or via email
ask for an extension from her teacher, explaining the situation

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: start a fire
gather his group together and ration the remaining food and water to last as long as possible
start rationing the remaining food and water supplies, ensuring everyone gets a share but also preserving what little they have left
start a fire for warmth and signal
find a sheltered area and try to create a makeshift shelter using any resources available such as branches, leaves, or snow
begin rationing the remaining food and water supplies among the group
build a temporary shelter using branches and leaves, which can provide them some warmth and protection from the elements
create a signal for rescue
start creating shelter by gathering materials such as branches, leaves, and snow, if available
start rationing the remaining food and water among the group
